General.Name: Afentra PLC
General.Description: Afentra plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an upstream oil and gas company primarily in Africa. The company is involved in the appraisal, exploration, development, and production of oil and gas. It holds 34% interest in an exploration project covering approximately 22,840 square kilometers located in Somaliland. The company was formerly known as Sterling Energy plc and changed its name to Afentra plc in May 2021. Afentra plc was incorporated in 1983 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: High Holborn House, London, United Kingdom, WC1V 6RL
